RelatedSentence: Sunday it was reported that former Princeton president William Bowen  called  graduating Haverford College students immature and arrogant for having forced Robert Birgeneau , the former chancellor of the University of California , Berkeley , to withdraw from appearing at Haverford 's commencement .
Some Haverford students had argued Birgeneau 's presence would have constituted an endorsement of his  handling  of a 2011 Occupy protest , which saw riot police descend on parts of Berkeley .

But Lyman was having none of it .
